Articles.Content: Please give me any links or PDF files or whatever to learning those languages. I know the basics of Java (if statement, loops, class types etc.) but I really would like to know how to code something fun or actually useful. Thanks in advance
I found this quite useful: http://www.codecademy.com/
I recommend EddieVanHalen98. Java, C++, funny junk.

I found this quite useful: http://www.codecademy.com/

I recommend EddieVanHalen98. Java, C++, funny junk.

Thanks guys! These two both seem like good places to learn.

I'll recommend that you take CS50: https://www.edx.org/course/harvardx/harvardx-cs50x-introduction-computer-1022

CS50 is the BEST course for programming I've ever seen. Taking the course is very easy and free (who doesn't like free stuff?) The course can be a bit challenging, but its never boring, and always awesome!
